segments.source_content:
---
description: How to make your Docusaurus site maximally search-engine-friendly.
sidebar_label: SEO
keywords:
  - seo
  - positioning
---

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: # Search engine optimization (SEO)

translations.zh-CN: # 搜索引擎优化（SEO）

segments.source_content: import BrowserWindow from '@site/src/components/BrowserWindow';

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_b608d7f0

segments.source_content: Docusaurus supports search engine optimization in a variety of ways.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus 通过多种方式支持搜索引擎优化。

segments.source_content: ## Global metadata {#global-metadata}

translations.zh-CN: ## 全局元数据 {#global-metadata}

segments.source_content: Provide global meta attributes for the entire site through the [site configuration](./configuration.mdx#site-metadata). The metadata will all be rendered in the HTML `<head>` using the key-value pairs as the prop name and value.

translations.zh-CN: 通过[站点配置](./configuration.mdx#site-metadata)为整个网站提供全局元属性。这些元数据将全部以键值对的形式作为属性名和值，渲染在 HTML 的 `<head>` 中。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_940e34e3

segments.source_content: Docusaurus adds some metadata out-of-the-box. For example, if you have configured [i18n](./i18n/i18n-introduction.mdx), you will get a [`hreflang`](https://developers.google.com/search/docs/advanced/crawling/localized-versions) alternate link.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus 默认会添加一些元数据。例如，如果配置了[国际化](./i18n/i18n-introduction.mdx)，你将获得一个 [`hreflang`](https://developers.google.com/search/docs/advanced/crawling/localized-versions) 备用链接。

segments.source_content: To read more about types of meta tags, visit [the MDN docs](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/meta).

translations.zh-CN: 要了解更多关于元标签的类型，请访问 [MDN 文档](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/meta)。

segments.source_content: ## Single page metadata {#single-page-metadata}

translations.zh-CN: ## 单页元数据 {#single-page-metadata}

segments.source_content: Similar to [global metadata](#global-metadata), Docusaurus also allows for the addition of meta-information to individual pages. Follow [this guide](./guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-head-metadata.mdx) for configuring the `<head>` tag. In short:

translations.zh-CN: 与[全局元数据](#global-metadata)类似，Docusaurus 也允许为单个页面添加元信息。按照[本指南](./guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-head-metadata.mdx)配置 `<head>` 标签。简而言之：

segments.source_content:
```md title="my-markdown-page.md"
# A cooking guide

<head>
  <meta name="keywords" content="cooking, blog"/>
</head>

Some content...
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_076d64d1

segments.source_content: Docusaurus automatically adds `description`, `title`, canonical URL links, and other useful metadata to each Markdown page. They are configurable through front matter:

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus 会自动为每个 Markdown 页面添加 `description`、`title`、规范 URL 链接和其他有用的元数据。它们可以通过 front matter 进行配置：

segments.source_content:
```md
---
title: Title for search engines; can be different from the actual heading
description: A short description of this page
image: a thumbnail image to be shown in social media cards
keywords: [keywords, describing, the main topics]
---
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_48ec8149

segments.source_content: When creating your React page, adding these fields in `Layout` would also improve SEO.

translations.zh-CN: 在创建 React 页面时，在 `Layout` 中添加这些字段也可以提升 SEO。

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Prefer to use front matter for fields like `description` and `keywords`: Docusaurus will automatically apply this to both `description` and `og:description`, while you would have to manually declare two metadata tags when using the `<head>` tag.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip

对于 `description` 和 `keywords` 等字段，建议使用 front matter：Docusaurus 会自动将其应用到 `description` 和 `og:description`，而使用 `<head>` 标签时则需要手动声明两个元标签。

:::

segments.source_content: For JSX pages, you can use the Docusaurus [`<Head>`](docusaurus-core.mdx#head) component.

translations.zh-CN: 对于 JSX 页面，可以使用 Docusaurus 的 [`<Head>`](docusaurus-core.mdx#head) 组件。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_1d510af2

segments.source_content:
:::tip

For convenience, the default theme `<Layout>` component accept `title` and `description` as props.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip

为了方便起见，默认主题的 `<Layout>` 组件接受 `title` 和 `description` 作为 props。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Static HTML generation {#static-html-generation}

translations.zh-CN: ## 静态 HTML 生成 {#static-html-generation}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus is a static site generator—HTML files are statically generated for every URL route, which helps search engines discover your content more easily.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus 是一个静态站点生成器——每个 URL 路由都会生成静态 HTML 文件，这有助于搜索引擎更容易发现你的内容。

segments.source_content: ## Image meta description {#image-meta-description}

translations.zh-CN: ## 图片元描述 {#image-meta-description}

segments.source_content: The alt tag for an image tells the search engine what the image is about, and is used when the image can't be visually seen, e.g. when using a screen reader, or when the image is broken. Alt tags are commonly supported in Markdown.

translations.zh-CN: 图片的 alt 标签告诉搜索引擎图片的内容，并在图片无法被视觉看到时使用，例如使用屏幕阅读器时或图片损坏时。Markdown 通常支持 alt 标签。

segments.source_content: You may also add a title for your image—this doesn't impact SEO much but is displayed as a tooltip when hovering above the image, usually used to provide hints.

translations.zh-CN: 你也可以为图片添加标题——这对 SEO 影响不大，但会在鼠标悬停在图片上时作为提示显示，通常用于提供提示。

segments.source_content:
```md
![Docusaurus banner](./assets/docusaurus-asset-example-banner.png 'Image title')
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_dc73c0d2

segments.source_content:
<BrowserWindow>

![Docusaurus banner](./assets/docusaurus-asset-example-banner.png 'Image title')

</BrowserWindow>

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_341c2c0e

segments.source_content: ## Rich search information {#rich-search-information}

translations.zh-CN: ## 丰富的搜索信息 {#rich-search-information}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus blogs support [rich search results](https://search.google.com/test/rich-results) out-of-the-box to get maximum search engine experience. The information is created depending on your meta information in blog/global configuration. In order to get the benefits of the rich search information, fill in the information about the post's publish date, authors, and image, etc. Read more about the meta-information [here](./blog.mdx).

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus 博客支持开箱即用的[丰富搜索结果](https://search.google.com/test/rich-results)，以获得最佳的搜索引擎体验。这些信息根据你在博客/全局配置中的元信息创建。为了获得丰富搜索信息的优势，请填写文章的发布日期、作者和图片等信息。了解更多关于元信息的[内容](./blog.mdx)。

segments.source_content: ## Robots file {#robots-file}

translations.zh-CN: ## Robots 文件 {#robots-file}

segments.source_content: A `robots.txt` file regulates search engines' behavior about which should be displayed and which shouldn't. You can provide it as [static asset](./static-assets.mdx). The following would allow access to all sub-pages from all requests:

translations.zh-CN: `robots.txt` 文件规范搜索引擎的行为，决定哪些内容应该被显示，哪些不应该。你可以将其作为[静态资源](./static-assets.mdx)提供。以下内容将允许所有请求访问所有子页面：

segments.source_content:
```text title="static/robots.txt"
User-agent: *
Disallow:
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_5347a9b5

segments.source_content: Read more about the robots file in [the Google documentation](https://developers.google.com/search/docs/advanced/robots/intro).

translations.zh-CN: 更多关于robots文件的信息，请参阅[Google官方文档](https://developers.google.com/search/docs/advanced/robots/intro)。

segments.source_content:
:::warning

**Important**: the `robots.txt` file does **not** prevent HTML pages from being indexed.

To prevent your whole Docusaurus site from being indexed, use the [`noIndex`](./api/docusaurus.config.js.mdx#noIndex) site config. Some [hosting providers](./deployment.mdx) may also let you configure a `X-Robots-Tag: noindex` HTTP header (GitHub Pages does not support this).

To prevent a single page from being indexed, use `<meta name="robots" content="noindex">` as [page metadata](#single-page-metadata). Read more about the [robots meta tag](https://developers.google.com/search/docs/advanced/robots/robots_meta_tag).

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::warning

**重要提示**：`robots.txt`文件**不能**阻止HTML页面被索引。

若要阻止整个Docusaurus站点被索引，请使用[`noIndex`](./api/docusaurus.config.js.mdx#noIndex)站点配置。某些[托管服务提供商](./deployment.mdx)可能也允许你配置`X-Robots-Tag: noindex` HTTP响应头（GitHub Pages不支持此功能）。

若要阻止单个页面被索引，可使用`<meta name="robots" content="noindex">`作为[页面元数据](#single-page-metadata)。了解更多关于[robots元标签](https://developers.google.com/search/docs/advanced/robots/robots_meta_tag)的信息。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Sitemap file {#sitemap-file}

translations.zh-CN: ## 站点地图文件 {#sitemap-file}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus provides the [`@docusaurus/plugin-sitemap`](./api/plugins/plugin-sitemap.mdx) plugin, which is shipped with `preset-classic` by default. It autogenerates a `sitemap.xml` file which will be available at `https://example.com/[baseUrl]/sitemap.xml` after the production build. This sitemap metadata helps search engine crawlers crawl your site more accurately.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus提供了默认集成在`preset-classic`中的[`@docusaurus/plugin-sitemap`](./api/plugins/plugin-sitemap.mdx)插件。该插件会在生产构建后自动生成`sitemap.xml`文件，访问地址为`https://example.com/[baseUrl]/sitemap.xml`。站点地图元数据能帮助搜索引擎爬虫更精准地抓取你的网站。

segments.source_content:
:::tip

The sitemap plugin automatically filters pages containing a `noindex` [robots meta directive](https://developers.google.com/search/docs/advanced/robots/robots_meta_tag).

For example, [`/examples/noIndex`](/examples/noIndex) is not included in the [Docusaurus sitemap.xml file](pathname:///sitemap.xml) because it contains the following [page metadata](#single-page-metadata):

```html
<head>
  <meta name="robots" content="noindex, nofollow" />
</head>
```

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip

站点地图插件会自动过滤包含`noindex`[robots元指令](https://developers.google.com/search/docs/advanced/robots/robots_meta_tag)的页面。

例如，[`/examples/noIndex`](/examples/noIndex)由于包含以下[页面元数据](#single-page-metadata)，因此未被包含在[Docusaurus的sitemap.xml文件](pathname:///sitemap.xml)中：

```html
<head>
  <meta name="robots" content="noindex, nofollow" />
</head>
```

:::

segments.source_content: ## Human readable links {#human-readable-links}

translations.zh-CN: ## 人性化链接 {#human-readable-links}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus uses your file names as links, but you can always change that using slugs, see this [tutorial](./guides/docs/docs-create-doc.mdx#document-id) for more details.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus默认使用文件名作为链接，但你可以通过slug进行修改，详见此[教程](./guides/docs/docs-create-doc.mdx#document-id)。

segments.source_content: ## Structured content {#structured-content}

translations.zh-CN: ## 结构化内容 {#structured-content}

segments.source_content: Search engines rely on the HTML markup such as `<h2>`, `<table>`, etc., to understand the structure of your webpage. When Docusaurus renders your pages, semantic markup, e.g. `<aside>`, `<nav>`, `<main>`, are used to divide the different sections of the page, helping the search engine to locate parts like sidebar, navbar, and the main page content.

translations.zh-CN: 搜索引擎依赖`<h2>`、`<table>`等HTML标记来理解网页结构。Docusaurus在渲染页面时会使用`<aside>`、`<nav>`、`<main>`等语义化标签划分页面不同区域，帮助搜索引擎定位侧边栏、导航栏和主体内容等部分。

segments.source_content: Most [CommonMark](https://spec.commonmark.org/0.30/#atx-headings) syntaxes have their corresponding HTML tags. By using Markdown consistently in your project, you will make it easier for search engines to understand your page content.

translations.zh-CN: 大多数[CommonMark](https://spec.commonmark.org/0.30/#atx-headings)语法都有对应的HTML标签。通过在项目中保持Markdown书写规范，将使搜索引擎更容易理解你的页面内容。
